title: Fundamentals of Design
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in design. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Fundamentals of Thermodynamics
description: Rigorous treatment of thermodynamics theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Intermediate Controls
description: In-depth analysis of controls principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Systems
description: Rigorous treatment of systems theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: Comprehensive study of dynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: Comprehensive study of dynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Analysis
description: Rigorous treatment of analysis theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Special Topics in Analysis
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of analysis. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.
prerequisites: CEVE 323 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: In-depth analysis of dynamics principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: CEVE 379 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Dynamics
description: Comprehensive study of dynamics with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: CEVE 378 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Optimization
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in optimization. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: CEVE 326 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Ethics
description: Interdisciplinary approach to ethics combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: CEVE 315 and senior standing or graduate status
